snippet: Elliott Management has expressed a belief that the computer storage company NetApp could do a lot more to raise its stock price, including a special dividend or even a sale.
abstract: Elliott Management has expressed a belief that the computer storage company NetApp could do a lot more to raise its stock price, including a special dividend or even a sale.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: What Elliott Management Sees in NetApp
